articles.author: Alexandra Ma
articles.title: China sanctions Pelosi and family, revenge for Taiwan visit
articles.description: Pelosi visited Taiwan earlier this week after China warned her not to. China has long pressured other countries not to recognize Taiwan as a country.
articles.content:
China imposed sanctions on House Speaker Nancy Pelosi in response her visit to Taiwan earlier this week, a move which infuriated Beijing.
Pelosi visited Taipei, the capital of Taiwan, from Tuesday t… [+2578 chars]

articles.title: Startup founders' mental health is crumbling under stress of this year
articles.description: Economic fear and funding uncertainty has put startup-founder mental health in a tailspin. Many suffer in silence because they worry talking openly will shred their credibility.

articles.title: Remote work is driving up salaries in cities across the US
articles.description: White-collar salaries across the US are closing in on those in San Francisco, as remote work drives up paychecks in mid-size cities by as much as 24%.
